data.quote: I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.
data.author: Vito Corleone (The Godfather)

data.quote: May the Force be with you.

data.quote: Say hello to my little friend!

data.quote: A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice Chianti.
data.author: Hannibal Lector (The Silence of the Lambs)
